lead_paragraph: Eight police officers and 14 suspected members of an Albanian rebel group have been killed in fighting in a northern Macedonian town, the authorities said Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Macedonia: 22 Killed as Police and Militants Clash
headline.main: Macedonia: 22 Killed as Police and Militants Clash

snippet: Eight police officers and 14 suspected members of an Albanian rebel group have been killed in fighting in a northern Macedonian town, the authorities said Sunday.
abstract: Eight police officers and 14 suspected members of Albanian rebel group Kosovo Liberation Army are killed during fighting in northern Macedonia.
